elements.name: HConfigFile
elements.description: Each game session has a single config file that holds all parameters from game.project and any overridden values.
notes: Properties can be overridden on command line or via the config file extension system. (See [ref:DM_DECLARE_CONFIGFILE_EXTENSION])

elements.name: ConfigFileGetString
elements.brief: Get config value as string, returns default if the...
elements.description: Get config value as string, returns default if the key isn't found

parameters.name: config
parameters.doc: Config file handle

parameters.name: key
parameters.doc: Key in format section.key (.key for no section)

parameters.name: default_value
parameters.doc: Default value to return if key isn't found

elements.examples:
static ExtensionResult AppInitialize(ExtensionAppParams* params)
{
    const char* projectTitle = ConfigFileGetString(params->m_ConfigFile, "project.title", "Untitled");
}
``````cpp
static dmExtension::Result AppInitialize(dmExtension::AppParams* params)
{
    const char* projectTitle = dmConfigFile::GetString(params->m_ConfigFile, "project.title", "Untitled");
}

elements.name: ConfigFileGetInt
elements.description: Get config value as integer, returns default if the key isn't found

parameters.name: config
parameters.doc: Config file handle

parameters.name: key
parameters.doc: Key in format section.key (.key for no section)

parameters.name: default_value
parameters.doc: Default value to return if key isn't found

elements.examples:
static ExtensionResult AppInitialize(ExtensionAppParams* params)
{
    int32_t displayWidth = ConfigFileGetInt(params->m_ConfigFile, "display.width", 640);
}
``````cpp
static dmExtension::Result AppInitialize(dmExtension::AppParams* params)
{
    int32_t displayWidth = dmConfigFile::GetInt(params->m_ConfigFile, "display.width", 640);
}

elements.name: ConfigFileGetFloat
elements.description: Get config value as float, returns default if the key isn't found

parameters.name: config
parameters.doc: Config file handle

parameters.name: key
parameters.doc: Key in format section.key (.key for no section)

parameters.name: default_value
parameters.doc: Default value to return if key isn't found

elements.examples:
static ExtensionResult AppInitialize(ExtensionAppParams* params)
{
    float gravity = ConfigFileGetFloat(params->m_ConfigFile, "physics.gravity_y", -9.8f);
}
``````cpp
static dmExtension::Result AppInitialize(dmExtension::AppParams* params)
{
    float gravity = dmConfigFile::GetFloat(params->m_ConfigFile, "physics.gravity_y", -9.8f);
}

elements.name: FConfigFileCreate
elements.brief: Called when config file extension is created
elements.description: Called when config file extension is created

parameters.name: config
parameters.doc: Config file handle

elements.name: FConfigFileDestroy
elements.brief: Called when config file extension is destroyed
elements.description: Called when config file extension is destroyed

parameters.name: config
parameters.doc: Config file handle

elements.name: FConfigFileGetString
elements.brief: Called when a string is requested from the config file extension
elements.description: Called when a string is requested from the config file extension

parameters.name: config
parameters.doc: Config file handle

parameters.name: key
parameters.doc: Key in format section.key (.key for no section)

parameters.name: default_value
parameters.doc: Default value to return if key isn't found

parameters.name: out
parameters.doc: Out argument where result is stored if found. Caller must free() this memory.

elements.description: Called when an integer is requested from the config file extension

parameters.name: config
parameters.doc: Config file handle

parameters.name: key
parameters.doc: Key in format section.key (.key for no section)

parameters.name: default_value
parameters.doc: Default value to return if key isn't found

parameters.name: out
parameters.doc: Out argument where result is stored if found.

elements.name: FConfigFileGetFloat
elements.brief: Called when a float is requested from the config file extension
elements.description: Called when a float is requested from the config file extension

parameters.name: config
parameters.doc: Config file handle

parameters.name: key
parameters.doc: Key in format section.key (.key for no section)

parameters.name: default_value
parameters.doc: Default value to return if key isn't found

parameters.name: out
parameters.doc: Out argument where result is stored if found.

elements.name: ConfigFileExtensionDescBufferSize
elements.brief: Used when registering new config file extensions.
elements.description: It defines the minimum size of the description blob being registered.

elements.name: FConfigFileGetFloat
elements.brief: Called when a float is requested from the config file extension
elements.description: Called when a float is requested from the config file extension

parameters.name: desc
parameters.doc:
An opaque buffer of at least ConfigFileExtensionDescBufferSize bytes.
                         This will hold the meta data for the plugin.

parameters.name: desc_size
parameters.doc: The size of the desc buffer. Must be >ConfigFileExtensionDescBufferSize

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: Name of the extension.

parameters.name: create
parameters.doc: Extension create function. May be null.

parameters.name: destroy
parameters.doc: Extension destroy function. May be null.

parameters.name: get_string
parameters.doc: Getter for string properties. May be null.

parameters.name: get_int
parameters.doc: Getter for int properties. May be null.

parameters.name: get_float
parameters.doc: Getter for float properties. May be null.

elements.name: DM_DECLARE_CONFIGFILE_EXTENSION
elements.brief: declare a new config file extension
elements.description:
Declare and register new config file extension to the engine.
Each get function should return true if it sets a proper value. Otherwise return false.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.doc: external extension symbol description (no quotes).

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: extension name. Human readable.

parameters.name: init
parameters.doc: init function. May be null.

parameters.name: get_string
parameters.doc: Gets a string property. May be null.
types: function(const char* section_plus_name, const char* default, const char** out)

parameters.name: get_int
parameters.doc: Gets an int property. May be null.
types: function(const char* section_plus_name, int default, int* out)

parameters.name: get_float
parameters.doc: Gets a float property. May be null.
types: function(const char* section_plus_name, float default, float* out)

elements.examples:
Register a new config file extension: 
DM_DECLARE_CONFIGFILE_EXTENSION(MyConfigfileExtension, "MyConfigfileExtension", create, destroy, get_string, get_int, get_float);

info.name: ConfigFile
info.description:
Configuration file access functions.
The configuration file is compiled version of the [file:game.project] file.
